summary: Unable to Set Course to After Completing Report Using [C]
description: After completing the Cerebellum report and returning to the camera interface, interacting with Ladagocia displays the prompt "[X] SET COURSE [C]" as expected. However, pressing [C] does not trigger any action, and no feedback or course-setting sequence occurs.
steps: 2. Complete exploration in Region 0b and transition to Region 1.
3. Access the Filesystem terminal and run SAFETY.a.
4. Use the camera system to locate and scan the scannable planet.
6. Run report.kp4 and finalize the Cerebellum report.
7. Observe the map update and automatic refocus onto Ladagocia.
8. Interact with Ladagocia to display the prompt "[X] SET COURSE [C]".
9. Press [X] to attempt to cancel set course.
10. Interact with Ladagocia to display the prompt "[X] SET COURSE [C]".
11. Press [C] to attempt to set course.
expected: Pressing [C] should initiate the course-setting action, updating mission state and triggering any associated animations, UI updates, or system changes.
actual: Pressing [C] produces no response. No action, UI change, or feedback occurs, leaving the player unable to set course to Ladagocia.
